DebtStatus.description: 0 = Active_RecoveryActionStopped, 1 = Active_SoldOnDebt, 2 = Active_CreditorNotificationPending, 3 = Active_CreditorNotificationSubmitted, 4 = Active_CreditorNotificationFailed, 5 = Active_NewDebt, 6 = Active_ReviewRequested, 7 = Active_AfterReview, 8 = Draft_PendingSubmission, 9 = Draft_Submitted, 10 = Draft_CreditorProposedNewDebt, 11 = RemovedAfterCourtRuling, 12 = RemovedAndAcknowledged, 13 = RemovedAfterAdviserReview, 14 = Cancelled, 15 = Expired, 16 = RemovedNeverActive
